title: S16 Ep51: Time Shifts: Experiences of Slipping into the Past & Future w/ Von Braschler
itunes:title: Time Shifts: Experiences of Slipping into the Past & Future w/ Von Braschler
description:
Darkness Radio presents Time Shifts: Experiences of Slipping into the Past & Future with Von Braschler

It is time to regain our control of time, today our guest Von Braschler visits to share strange tales of Time Slip phenomena and tips on how to become more aware of these moments and to actually put yourself out of time and into the past or future.

Are ghosts, Aliens and Cryptid Creatures simply moments in time playing out in front of our eyes or have these entities mastered the ability to slip between the time between time? Open your mind and allow the kick start of a new paradigm today and reexamine the mysteries of time and the paranormal.

Get Von Braschler's book here: https://amzn.to/3nJ3uY5

Get the book The Wreck of Titan as discussed on todays show: https://amzn.to/3eSG5PR
